hero.metaText: Meta Business Partner and WhatsApp Business Solution Provide

subText: Boost your sales by implementing conversational strategies on WhatsApp.
At WOZTELL, we have repeatedly witnessed how our clients have achieved incredible results by communicating with their customers on the channels they prefer.
We have extensive experience in various industries and have successfully implemented dozens of marketing and sales strategies using our solutions.
marketingAndSales.blueText: Are you ready to take your sales to the next level?

subText: Your customers want 24/7 support, and if it’s on their preferred channels, even better. But not only that, but they also want an exceptional experience…
What if you could give them what they ask for automatically or, in more complex cases, provide personalized assistance?
Delight your customers with a 5-star customer support service that you can also automate, saving up to 80% of your costs.

cardTexts: The entire team responds on the same WhatsApp platform

subText: Increase your e-commerce sales with WhatsApp
Add the most effective channel to your online sales strategy. Empower your marketing, customer service, and sales with WOZTELL.
Receive orders and payments through WhatsApp
Whether you have an eCommerce or not, if you want to sell products through channels like WhatsApp, we know how to make it happen.

chatGPTAndWhatsApp.headingText: Create a WhatsApp and ChatGPT-connected chatbot that works 24/7
chatGPTAndWhatsApp.subHeadingText: Intelligent Conversations with WhatsApp and ChatGPT
subText: Combine the efficiency of WhatsApp API with the intelligence of ChatGPT to increase sales and reduce costs.

With WOZTELL, you can connect your ChatGPT GPT to WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger, and Webchat to address customer or lead inquiries. Not only based on general information and the model’s configuration instructions. You can unlock a world of possibilities for your business.

cardTexts: WhatsApp + ChatGPT for Marketing and Sales

footer.imageText: We are committed to the development of the conversational business

contactPage.subText: Our team of experts is ready to design, develop, and launch your custom conversational solution.
contactPage.imageText: Meta Business Partner and WhatsApp Business Solution Provider

projects.title: Are you a WhatsApp Cloud API official provider?
projects.description: Yes, at WOZTELL, we are WhatsApp BSP (Business Solution Provider) since 2019, and one of the firsts in the world. We have 24/7 service and assist in more than 5 languages such as English, Spanish, and Chinese.

projects.title: Can you create customized chatbots?
projects.description: Yes, our projects team will implement and structure the chatbots your company needs to cut down costs and achieve your sales goals.

projects.title: Can I access the last features of WhatsApp and META?
projects.description: Yes, since we are BSP, you will always have the new WhatsApp features that WhatsApp launches in the future. You can also use Facebook Messenger, Instagram, and Webchat conversational solutions.

projects.title: What is the project estimate price?
projects.description: It depends on the project’s complexity and time. But we promise you is worth every penny. Our projects usually start at 2,5k€.

projects.title: How long does the project development take?
projects.description: It all depends on the project’s complexity. Usually, in less than 2 weeks our team will have everything ready.

projects.title: Can I integrate my tech stack with you?
projects.description: Yes, our team can integrate your project with your favorite tools.

projects.title: Do you have On-Premise solutions?
projects.description: Yes, we are experts in WhatsApp Cloud On-Premise solutions. We have expert engineers that will implement your solutions on your servers.

containerTwo.title: A Team committed to your Success
containerTwo.subTitle: Our team of experts is ready to offer you personalized attention via WhatsApp 24/7 in English, Spanish and Chinese. We are here to help you.
